function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"NBPI may produce reactive ions and reactive oxygen species in the air, which could have unknown health effects.","Impact":"Potential harm to occupants' health if negative health effects are not thoroughly understood and mitigated.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research and testing to understand the health effects of reactive ions and oxygen species, and implement appropriate measures to mitigate any potential harm.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, advanced filtration systems, and health impact assessments.","People":"Occupants of buildings where NBPI is used.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, and health and safety regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"NBPI has been adopted in various types of buildings, but its effectiveness in controlling the transmission of contagious diseases like coronaviruses needs to be further studied.","Impact":"Potential failure to effectively control the transmission of contagious diseases, leading to increased risk of infection among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Conduct research and studies to evaluate the effectiveness of NBPI in controlling the transmission of contagious diseases, and implement additional measures if necessary.","Technologies":"Epidemiological studies, air quality monitoring, and contagion modeling.","People":"Occupants of buildings where NBPI is used, public health authorities, and researchers.","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities, and research institutions."},{"Description":"Disinfectant fogging systems may pose a health risk if not properly regulated and applied, leading to exposure of building occupants to harmful chemicals.","Impact":"Exposure to toxic chemicals and respiratory irritants resulting in adverse health effects for building occupants.","Mitigation":"Proper training in application, regulation, and control of disinfectant fogging systems, and use of safe and approved disinfectant products.","Technologies":"Training programs, air quality monitoring, and safety regulations.","People":"Occupants of buildings where fogging systems are used, cleaning and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, and health and safety regulatory authorities."}]}
